item.title: PromQL筆記
item.description: Features Support Standard Markdown / CommonMark and GFM(GitHub Flavored Markdown); Full-featured: Real-time Preview, Image (cross-domain) upload, Preformatted text/Code blocks/Tables insert, Code fold, Search replace, Read only, Themes, Multi-languages, L18n, HTML entities, Code syntax highlighting…; Markdown Extras : Support ToC (Table of Contents), Emoji, Task lists, @Links…; Compatible with all major browsers (IE8+), compatible Zepto.js and iPad; Support identification, interpretation, fliter of the HTML tags; Support TeX (LaTeX expressions, Based on KaTeX), Flowchart and Sequence Diagram of Markdown extended syntax; Support AMD/CMD (Require.
